requirements.name: Member fields and Constructors
requirements.requirement: Add member fields and constructors to the Student class.
requirements.inverse: Member fields and constructors not added as required.

requirements.name: Getters and Setters
requirements.requirement: Add public getters and setters for the Student class member fields.
requirements.inverse: Getters and setters not added as required.

requirements.name: Insert into collection
requirements.requirement: Given a student object, enrolled, and a vector of students, place the enrolled student into an open space.
requirements.inverse: Enrolled student not placed into an open space as required.

requirements.name: Remove from collection
requirements.requirement: Given an integer idNumber and a vector of students, replace the student with the given ID number.
requirements.inverse: Student with the given ID number not replaced as required.

requirements.name: Retrieve from collection
requirements.requirement: Given an integer idNumber and a vector of students, return the student with the given ID number.
requirements.inverse: Student with the given ID number not retrieved as required.
